description: This file defines an Angular component 'TopNavComponent' responsible for rendering the top navigation bar, which includes an observable 'itemCount' reflecting the number of items in the shopping cart managed via 'CartStoreService'. It includes metadata for Angular, such as selector, template URL, style URL, and dependencies for routing.

classes.name: TopNavComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for the application's top navigation bar, providing UI for cart item count and event emission for cart interactions.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Injects the CartStoreService to access cart data and initializes the itemCount computed property.
